v1.headline: Founder & Speaker | Built 185+ Profitable Personal Brands for Founders, Creators & Coaches | LinkedIn Expert & B2B Creator | Trusted by: Shopify, IBM, HubSpot, Xero + more | Co-Founder: cnnctd.
v1.about:
I'm the personal brand manager behind top 1% LinkedIn accounts.

Here's the proof. I've delivered:

225M+ impressions → VIRAL content marketing 
1.1M profile views → MILLIONS of eyes on your offer
£6.5M revenue → TANGIBLE business growth

Thanks to my:

• 5 years experience (built 150+ Founder-led brands)
• First-party data (I've produced 15,500 LI posts)
• PROVEN LinkedIn growth strategies & models

I work with Founders, Coaches, C-Suite teams, Business Execs, Creatives & Freelancers like you to:

a) Scale your LinkedIn growth & presence
b) Carve out a HIGH-VALUE personal brand
c) Win trust, seriously grow pipeline & make ££

So you can:

Stop wasting ££ on bad lead-gen tactics
Build + scale the business of your dreams
Earn life freedom + attract new opportunities

HOW I HELP:

1:1 & Company LinkedIn Coaching:

- Dominate the LI algo & create viral posts
- Scale your following, traffic & engagement
- Turn LinkedIn into a social selling funnel

LinkedIn Content Ghostwriting:

- Get 'done for you' LinkedIn posts 
- Turn expertise into monetisable assets
- Earn trust as a thought leader
